articles.title: Trump's Additional 25% Tariff Comes Into Effect In India, Takes Total To 50%
articles.description: The U.S. has imposed an additional 25% tariff on many Indian products, bringing the total duty to 50%, effective August 27, 2025. This move by President Donald Trump aims to penalize India for its purchases of Russian oil, escalating trade tensions between the two nations. India is reportedly exploring alternative markets and domestic demand to mitigate the impact on its exports, particularly in sectors like garments, gems, and furniture. [4, 6, 7, 9, 11, 12, 15, 18]

articles.title: Israel calls Gaza City evacuation 'inevitable' as US hosts talks on post-war Gaza
articles.description: Israeli and U.S. officials are meeting in Washington to discuss post-war plans for Gaza, even as Israel's military declares the evacuation of Gaza City "inevitable" ahead of a major offensive. The talks come amid mounting international outrage over recent deadly Israeli strikes on a southern Gaza hospital and calls for a ceasefire. [5, 10, 14, 16, 17]

articles.title: Heavy rain causes flooding, landslides and 8 deaths in Vietnam and Thailand
articles.description: Heavy monsoon rains have triggered widespread flooding and landslides across parts of Southeast Asia and India. In Vietnam and Thailand, at least eight deaths have been reported in the aftermath of Tropical Storm Kajiki, which caused significant flooding and landslips. Separately, intense rains in Indian-controlled Kashmir have led to flash floods and landslides, resulting in at least 34 deaths and displacing over 200,000 people in Pakistan due to overflowing rivers. [17, 18, 19, 20, 21, 22, 23]
